title: Ineos Grenadiers Bolsters 2024 Squad with Raft of Renewals
content:
The British squad reups with six more riders ahead of the 2024 season with 25 riders now confirmed to its roster for next year.

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers Bolsters 2024 Squad with Raft of Renewals on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
